contentrichtext.text: <!-- This article was auto-generated by [[User:Polbot]]. --> {{taxobox |status = LR/nt |status_system = IUCN2.3 |regnum = [[Plant]]ae |unranked_divisio = [[Angiosperms]] |unranked_classis = [[Eudicots]] |unranked_ordo = [[Rosids]] |ordo = [[Malpighiales]] |familia = [[Salicaceae]] |genus = ''[[Xylosma]]'' |species = '''''X. fawcettii''''' |binomial = ''Xylosma fawcettii'' |binomial_authority = [[Ignatz Urban|Urb.]] |}} '''''Xylosma fawcettii''''' is a species of [[plant]] in the [[Salicaceae]] family. It is [[Endemism|endemic]] to [[Jamaica]]. ==Sources== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. [http://www.iucnredlist.org/search/details.php/36128/all ''Xylosma fawcettii'']. [http://www.iucnredlist.org 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. ] Downloaded on 24 August 2007. [[Category:Xylosma|fawcettii]] [[Category:Flora of Jamaica]] [[Category:Near threatened plants]] {{Salicaceae-stub}}
